title: How to Make a Cinnamon, Honey and Pineapple Flavored Fruit Salad

steps.headline: Take the pineapple juice and fruit.
Pour the pineapple juice in the bowl then put all the fruit in the pineapple juice and let it soak.
Take the honey and leftover pineapple juice and stir it together.
Take the fruit out of the juice.
Put it it a bowl and empty out the pineapple juice in the bowl into the sink.
Pour the honey mixture on the fruit.

text: Take the pineapple juice and fruit.  Cut the fruit.  Pour the pineapple juice in the bowl then put all the fruit in the pineapple juice and let it soak.  Take the honey and leftover pineapple juice and stir it together.  Add a sprinkle of cinnamon.  Take the fruit out of the juice.  Put it it a bowl and empty out the pineapple juice in the bowl into the sink.  Pour the honey mixture on the fruit.  Sprinkle with cinnamon. Yummy!
